description:
Having been shot with the DNA Control Medicine, Ryuji discovers that he`s been given the ability to shapeshift! His first order of business with his new powers is destroying Junta`s life--starting with alienating him from his friends and the ones who love him. After he taunts Junta`s powerlessness to stop him, Junta makes up his mind on how he`ll beat Ryuji.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il pericoloso potere del pericolosissimo Ryuji
Le pouvoir dangereux du non moins dangereux Ryuji.
アブナイ竜二の危ない能力
